page.title: 15Do It Yourself in Craigie.
page.content: Five of us went to the big{D.I.Y. {store}in{Glenearn Road}and it was great fun. The manager showed us round the store and then answered all our questions. He was patient. People do work on their houses by themselves as it is cheaper than using tradesmen. There are{16 000 different items}for sale. They have tools for all sorts of jobs and materials for tackling most things in a home. There are{thirty employees}there and the {shop}is{open seven days a week, except for Christmas. They are very busy on{Sundays}when most people have time to shop. The manager said that they had got{busier}from{passing trade since{Tesco's}had opened on a{Sunday. The shop sells furniture in kits and electrical goods such as drills and lawn mowers.{Texas Homecare}has branches all over Britain.
